package_spec.name: Uninstall MSI ||Installed Applications_Name||
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:3600 uninstall.vbs "||Installed Applications_Silent Uninstall String||" "||Installed Applications_Uninstallable||"

package_spec.name: Managed Application Upgrade - ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Name|| ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Current Version||
package_spec.command: cmd /c ||Out of Date Managed Applications_Command|| & cmd /c cscript //T:3600 "..\..\Tools\Managed Applications\run-managed-applications-scan.vbs"

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Disabled
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Disabled
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Disabled

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Automatic
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Automatic
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Automatic

package_spec.display_name: Service Start Mode - Set to Manual
package_spec.name: Service Start Mode - Set to Manual
package_spec.command: cmd /c cscript //T:600 set-service-mode.vbs "||Service Details_Service Name||" Manual

package_spec.name: Modify Tanium Client Setting
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"values":["REG_DWORD","REG_SZ"],"helpString":"Required: Select one registry value type","value":"","promptText":"Choose a registry value type","requireSelection":true,"label":"RegType","key":"$1","defaultValue":"","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::DropDownParameter"},{"maxChars":64,"validationExpressions":[{"flags":"","helpString":"Only alpha characters allowed","expression":".\\S*","model":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression","parameterType":"com.tanium.models::ValidationExpression"}],"restrict":null,"helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting name. Be sure to include underscores '_' where needed. Spaces are generally not supported.","value":"Client Setting Name goes here","promptText":"Client Setting Name","label":"ValueName","key":"$2","defaultValue":"Client Setting Name goes here","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"},{"maxChars":256,"validationExpressions":[],"restrict":null,"helpString":"Required: Enter the client setting data. Enter word 'remove' to delete the setting.","value":"Client Setting Data goes here","promptText":"Client Setting Data","label":"ValueData","key":"$3","defaultValue":"Client Setting Data goes here","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::TextInputParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}

package_spec.display_name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.name: Set Windows Tanium Client Logging Level
package_spec.command: cmd /c reg add "HKLM\Software\Tanium\Tanium Client" /v LogVerbosityLevel /t REG_DWORD /d $1 /f
package_spec.parameter_definition: {"parameters":[{"maximum":99,"minimum":0,"helpString":"Enter a logging level, 0=no logging, 99=verbose logging","value":"1","label":"Log Level (0-99)","snapInterval":1,"stepSize":1,"key":"$1","defaultValue":"1","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter","model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::NumericParameter"}],"model":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray","parameterType":"com.tanium.components.parameters::ParametersArray"}
